Are you sure you want to activate your account ?

Deactivating your account will temporarily hide your profile data from our live app users.\n If you want to use the app again you can sign in again to re-activate your account. \n Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?

Deleting your account will erase all your profile data from our application servers.\n If you want to use the app again you will have to create a new account.\n Are you sure you want to delete all your account data?

Your email makes it easier to recover your account, and for you and your friends to find each other on Khaleeji , and more!
Allow others to find me using my mobile number
Providing your mobile number will verify you are a Khaleeji user! It also makes it easier to recover your account, and for you and your friends to find each other on Khaleeji, and more!
